title: Requires criminal history check of persons seeking out of country employment or out of country adoption
summary: Requires a criminal history check of persons seeking employment in a foreign country or seeking to adopt a foreign child where official documentation of such person's background and character is an eligibility requirement; and authorizes a reasonable fee for such search, to be deposited into the missing and exploited children clearinghouse fund to enhance the prevention of child exploitation.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the search of criminal history records for persons seeking employment in or to adopt a child from a foreign country
